item.description: Now that summer is here, it’s time to start thinking about all that outdoor fun! Barbecues, lazy days by the pool, and weekend beach trips are all made a little easier when you have a few tricks up your sleeve.

item.title: He Wrapped Something Around The Barrel Of His Gun, Creating This Insane Hack
item.description: Going out in the morning to hunt can leave you quite famished. At 4 a.m., no one wants to actually cook anything. Leave it to these gun-lovers to figure out how to kill two birds with one stone, and end up with some pretty crispy bacon!
